\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, whose \w eyesight|strong="H5869"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w grown|strong="H1961"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w dim|strong="H3544"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w room|strong="H4725"\w*.

Now \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w yet|strong="H2962"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w yet|strong="H2962"\w* \w been|strong="H2962"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w never|strong="H5769"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w atoned|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*.’” Samuel Shares the Vision

\w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; \w then|strong="H3372"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*,

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Beersheba \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* confirmed \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
